ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors want to acknowledge COMPETE2020 and the FCT project PTDC/CTM-ENE/2391/2014. The authors wish to express their gratitude to the Ministry of Science and Higher Education of Poland for funding Project No. IP2012 035572 “Thermodynamic research on Ag–Li alloys as a material for safe storage of hydrogen and energy”, financed from the budget for science in the years 2013–2015 and the European Union for the financial support of Project POIG.02.01.00–12–175/09.
